Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, I need to understand the raw system log. Each line has a timestamp, action type, and attributes like app and window title. The challenge is grouping these into cases and translating actions into meaningful activities.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Starting with case identification. A case should represent a logical unit of work. Looking at the log, the user opens different documents in various apps. For example, Document1.docx in Word, then an email in Chrome, then Report_Draft.pdf in Acrobat, and Budget_2024.xlsx in Excel. Each of these seems like separate tasks.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So cases could be based on the document name. Lets check the documents involved: Quarterly_Report.docx, Document1.docx, Email - Inbox, Report_Draft.pdf, Budget_2024.xlsx. Wait, the email case is a bit tricky. So perhaps each document or email interaction is a case.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: That seems plausible. Each document/email interaction is a case. The case ID can be the document name or a unique identifier based on that. For the email, since the window is Email - Inbox but the action is about a specific email, maybe the case is the specific email.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Next, activity naming. The raw actions are FOCUS, TYPING, SWITCH, CLICK, etc. Need to translate these into higher-level activities. For example: FOCUS on a document could be Open Document or Start Working on Document. TYPING could be Edit Document or Type Content.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: SWITCH actions could be Switch to Another Application but maybe its better to group them as Switch to ToApp to indicate the transition. However, in process mining, activities should be standardized. So maybe Switch to Application as a generic activity.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now, translating the actions into activities. For each line: First line: 2024-12-11T08:59:50.000Z,FOCUS,App=Microsoft Word,Window=Quarterly_Report.docx This is the user focusing on the document. So activity could be Open Document.

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: So the cases are: 1. Quarterly_Report.docx (events 1, 23, 24, 25, 26) 2. Document1.docx (events 2, 3, 4, 5, 20, 21, 22) 3. Email - Inbox (events 7, 8, 9, 10, 11) 4. Report_Draft.pdf (events 13, 14) 5. Budget_2024.xlsx (events 15, 16, 17, 18) 6. SWITCH events: SWITCH from Document1.docx to Chrome (event 6) is part of case 2 (Document1.docx), SWITCH from Chrome to Acrobat (event 12) is part of case 3 (Email - Inbox), SWITCH from Excel to Word (event 19) is part of case 5 (Budget_2024.xlsx).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: So total events in the event log: 5 (Quarterly) + 8 (Document1) + 6 (Email) + 2 (PDF) + 5 (Budget) = 26, which matches the original log. So thats correct.
